articles.title: Some Twitter employees have reportedly locked their accounts fearing reprisal from Trump supporters - The Verge
articles.description: Following the ban of the president’s Twitter account, some Twitter employees have set their accounts to private and scrubbed their online biographies over concerns they may be targeted by his supporters.
articles.content:
Twitter permanently suspended President Trump from the platform after the Capitol riot
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Some Twitter employees have set their accounts to private and scrubbed… [+2303 chars]
